price: (9) That is because they disliked what Allāh revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
